Content.title: Aaron Powell
Content.name: Aaron Powell
Content.bodyText:
Nice, where are you reading the google map key from, web.config? That could pose a problem if you have multiple websites in the 1 umbraco instance. Would it be possible to have it as part of the data when configuring the data type (if not that could be a way to make it even cooler ;).

How much control do you provide over the things like:
- default zoom level
- icon used
- bubble text
